reviewText: This book gives very good advice and is well-written and clear.  I highly recommend it!
This DVD goes step by step how to drive your horse. From harnessing to driving out on the road with cars.

I watched this video twice as well as read some books and trained my horse to pull a two wheeled training cart.  She even pulled my husband and I away after our wedding.  I was very happy with the results.  I now drive my horse everywhere.
